title: ZipRecruiter Jobs Scraper
description: A fast and lightweight actor to scrape job listings from ZipRecruiter using HTTP and Cheerio.

startUrl.title: Start URL (optional)
startUrl.description: A specific ZipRecruiter URL to start scraping from. If provided, it overrides Keyword and Location.

location.title: Location
location.description: The job location to filter by (e.g., 'New York, NY', 'Remote').

results_wanted.title: Results Wanted
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of job listings to scrape.

collect_details.title: Collect Job Details
collect_details.description: If enabled, the scraper will visit each job's detail page to extract more information. Disabling this makes the scrape faster but returns less data.

preferCandidateSearch.title: Prefer '/candidate/search' URLs
preferCandidateSearch.description: If enabled, the scraper will prefer using the '/candidate/search' URL structure, which can sometimes be more stable for pagination.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: The maximum number of parallel requests.

downloadIntervalMs.title: Download Interval (ms)
downloadIntervalMs.description: Milliseconds to wait between requests to be polite to the server and avoid blocks.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxies to be used by the crawler.

postedWithin.title: Date Posted
postedWithin.description: Filter by how recently the job was posted.
